title: Grenfell Tower: from hope to tragedy
itunes:title: Grenfell Tower: from hope to tragedy
itunes:subtitle: Ahead of the BBC Two documentary Before Grenfell: A Hidden History, architect Peter Deakins discusses his involvement in the creation of the tower block and considers its place in the history of social housing in Britain
description:
Ahead of the BBC Two documentary Before Grenfell: A Hidden History, architect Peter Deakins discusses his involvement in the creation of the tower block and considers its place in the history of social housing in Britain

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
